delta.name: Delta
delta.title: Argent Squad Sniper & Infiltration Expert
delta.description: A sharp-tongued Argent Squad sniper and infiltration specialist who learned to survive on the streets of Nar Shaddaa.
delta.voiceStyle: Casual, mocking, New-Yorker edge. Sounds like she’s joking until it’s too late.
delta.tooltip: Delta reflects your character through lethal subtlety and street-hardened instinct

levelGreetings.1: You wanna be a shadow? Try not to trip over your own boots.
levelGreetings.2: First clean hit. Not bad. Still sloppy, but not bad.
levelGreetings.3: Quick in, quick out. Almost impressive.
levelGreetings.4: Now you’re movin’ like a ghost. Don’t chew your luck.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway there. Technique’s solid. Don’t get soft.
levelGreetings.7: Perfect hit’s the one nobody knows happened.
levelGreetings.8: They’re whisperin’ your name now. That’s good.
levelGreetings.10: You’re officially scary. Don’t screw it up.

levelGreetings.1: You wanna sneak? Try not to embarrass us both.
levelGreetings.2: Didn’t set anything on fire. I’m shocked.
levelGreetings.3: Slidin’ through security like you belong.
levelGreetings.4: Cleaner than half my old squad.
levelGreetings.5: Walkin’ into restricted zones like you own ’em. Bold. Dumb. I like it.
levelGreetings.6: Smooth entry, clean exit. Rare combo.
levelGreetings.8: High society to gutter scum without missin’ a beat.
levelGreetings.9: Stop makin’ this look easy. You’re givin’ me expectations.
levelGreetings.10: Anyone. Anywhere. Try not to believe the hype.

assassin_sniper.confirmation: Patience and precision make you untouchable.

assassin_shadow.greeting: Shadow Operative. You exist between moments.

assassin_spy.greeting: Assassin-Spy. You study before you strike.

infiltrator_ghost.greeting: Slippin’ through where you shouldn’t be.

infiltrator_phantom.greeting: They argue if you were real.

guidance.class: Pick the stuff that makes you faster, quieter, deadlier. You wanna sneak past these losers and still be breathin' when the credits hit the floor.
guidance.talents: Go for silent takedowns, smooth escapes, and anything that keeps you from gettin' splattered. Dead men don't talk, but smart ones survive.
guidance.abilities: Dexterity, precision, brains. Strength? Only helps if you ain't gettin' seen. Keep your head down and your eyes open.
guidance.skills: Stealth, anatomy, infiltration—know where to poke so they never get up. Learn it all, kid. Nar Shaddaa ain't forgiving.
guidance.multiclass: Extra skills? Fine. The more ways you can ruin somebody's day, the less likely it is you end up dead in a gutter.
guidance.hp: Toughness helps, but lemme tell ya—if they see you, it's already too late. Move smart, hit fast, survive.

tier1: Miss once, you don’t get a second shot.
